data.text: Zɔi nɛai bɛ ga maaɠolo, faaɠwɛgi wɔin ɠa naa ma,
Nu ʋagɔi ɠa ɗa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-undaanɛɛi zɔlɔɔ,
Suɲɔu vai la ɗa ga nui losu ɓɛtɛa,
Ziilɔɔ anzanui ɠa ɗa sinigi nɔungi wuzeɠe,
Telebo nuiti ta-ɠisiɛiti ta faa zɔle faiti nɔ ʋa,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti daawooiti ta ga baliiti ti nui ʋaazu,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta lokana, ti la mɔ ɠɛa ná!
Nui ɠa ɗa maamusɛi zɔlɔɔ, é zoloo ná-kisiɛ ʋagɔiti ma,
Fizɔgɛ nu ɠɛ ga nui zobo ge la bɛ, botiɠɛ nu ɠila nɔ ɠɛ è ya,
Telebo nui ɠa ɗa ɠaaɓa ná-toganiiti ma,
Zɔi é ná-tii ɠɛɛzu, naa ɠa daamianigi zɔlɔɔ ga bɔɔlɔa,
Nu ɲɔi ɠaazu ɠa ɗa ɠula faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti daamiizuʋɛ ʋa,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ɠa ɗa ɠɔ ga tɔ ɓɔɠɔi ná-zɛɛiti ma ʋalii,
Nui laawooi ʋɔ, toɠa zoo é undaanɛ wola ɠaalɛ ba,
Ɠimalala nui ná-pelei zɔlegɛ tɔ ɓɔɠɔi ɠaazu,
Ɠimalala nui ɠa ɗa ná-ziiɠaawanai ɠula kɛlɛma gaamago nɔ,
Nui é gaamai ɠulazu kɛlɛma, naa ɠa telebo fai lɛɛzu,
Kpɔɛzuɠula ɲakaiti ta ɗa maawanai wo eɠɛ boɠa zɔkpɔi,
Gaama nui ɠa yɛ ná ɠɔ,
Niiti ti faa ɲɔiti kpɛtɛzu, naati ziimaʋɛti daavegɛ ga yaava vaiti,
Maanɔɠɔ nɔpɛ ge la zeelia telebo nui ma,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI la wɔinni ga zɛɛ wo nuiti,
Ɠima nui la ɗa ga ná-faaɠwɛgi zulɛa,
Niiti ti zoogai yeemaleʋebosu, naati ta ɗa lo faa wolaiti untuɠɔ,
Ziizoolɛi a ɠɛna nui yiimaʋɛ, toɠa ɗa vɔ,
Telebo nui ɠa ɗa ɠɛ ga ʋelela ʋagɔ bɔɔlaiti bɛ,
Sua ɓɛ nui nii dɔɔʋɛai, naa la sua zɔlɔɔga, é ʋa gee.
Ʋɛ telebodai ɠɛɛzu ná, miná ɠa zɛnvui ná,
